short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Blender issue pages, this extension adds a button that displays a menu with canned responses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a button that displays a menu of canned answers at https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/issues/*
